node.display_long_description:
A portal to new worlds, a virtual home filled with endless experiences to discover and explore, a place to connect with loved ones. World travel, casual games, media customization,  adventure, and relaxation.

- Invite your friends and family, and travel together to new places to see the world - hundreds of virtual travels to all continents: take a city tour, a hot air balloon ride, a back-country road trip
- Explore the depth of the ocean - go diving in the Great Barrier Reef of Australia, or swim with dolphins in the Pacific Ocean
- Relax and practice meditation in nature - guided, or unguided
- Listen to classical music
- Play with your virtual pet
- Play games, share photos, upload and watch your own videos - standard, and 360, and step into them together.

Alcove has something for everyone, no matter your age. Download Alcove and start exploring today!

Note: Alcove will keep growing with new immersive experiences and features. Please let us know what you’d love to see next.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1.153
- Keyboard has been redesigned to improve ease of use.
- Fixed missing characters in keyboard.
- Minor UI fixes.

1.152
- Minor fixes.

1.151
- Major update to Alcove Settings!
       - Added option for Smooth Locomotion.
       - Added option for Visible Avatars in Media.
       - Visual update to improve clarity.
- Fixed several issues related to account usage.
- Improved loading times.
- Fixed missing effects in certain environments.
- Avatars now fade out within a certain distance.
- Keyboard improvements.
- Fixed being unable to interact with UI in certain positions.
- Several bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.142
- Minor fixes for in-app account creation.

1.141
- New experience: MultiBrush by Rendever  - Available on App Lab!
- Don't have an Alcove account? We've added in-app account creation.
- Into Space DLC now has preview trailers.
- Reduced app size.
- Bug fixes and Optimization.

1.129
- New experience: Jigsaw 360 - Multiplayer coming soon!
- New videos from Malta in the travel globe!
- Fixed issue where multiple avatars would overlap when teleporting
- Fixed issue where avatar profile icons would load incorrectly

node.display_short_description: Take off into space with 2 gravity-defying expeditions, 14 and 11 minutes each. These award-winning short VR films from Faber Courtial took the world by storm at Cannes XR, Venice Film Festival, Tribeca and many more, by conveying how it must feel to actually be out in the open cosmos. Visit unknown worlds of extraordinary richness, detail and authenticity - perfectly reconstructed in 3D from original NASA and ESA data.

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (Alcove) 才能玩

nodes.title: NEW! Visible Avatars in Alcove videos
nodes.body_text:
Now when you're with friends in Alcove's 360 videos, you can see each other's avatars! We're excited to bring you another highly requested feature that you can control from Alcove's Main Menu Settings. Invite your Oculus Quest friends on a virtual vacation and try it out!

A BIG THANK YOU to the Alcovers who requested this capability. We appreciate your support and can't wait to bring you even more new and exciting features and experiences based on your feedback.

We're always happy to hear from you! Let us know how we can improve Alcove to make it the very best VR experience for you, your family and friends. Reach us directly with your comments, questions and recommendations at feedback@alcovevr.com.

All our very best,
Team Alcove

nodes.title: NEW by Popular Demand! Activate Smooth Locomotion in Alcove.
nodes.body_text:
You asked for Locomotion and we heard you! We're excited to bring you our latest release featuring Smooth Locomotion, a top feature request.

Now, with Smooth Locomotion enabled, you can use your controller thumb sticks to glide through your virtual home away from home!

Make the switch by opening your Alcove Settings Menu, then select the Smooth Locomotion toggle. You can always switch it off again if you begin to feel any discomfort.

Thanks to all of our users who requested Locomotion. We value the time you spend in Alcove and can't wait to bring you more new and exciting features and content based on your feedback.

Let us know how we can improve Alcove to make it the very best VR experience for you, your family and friends. Reach us directly with your comments, questions and recommendations at feedback@alcovevr.com. Thanks for your support!

Happy locomoting! 
Team Alcove

node.reviewDescription: Totally loving Alcove! This is so much better than searching and downloading apps and browsing the web for VR content - and then experiencing it alone!  Alcove is a fully immersive experience with everything you can imagine - yoga, travel, music, creative spaces, playing games...... and it's all in my own home that I can customize (including the views - prefer the ocean view).   And, I don't have to experience it alone.  I invited my brother into my house for a game of chess and my dad in a couple of times to show him some of the videos (he liked the underwater exploration).  There has been new content/experiences added since I downloaded Alcove… so please keep the updates coming! Thanks!
node.reviewTitle: A true place to call home in VR
